paper_abstract: We propose an analytical representation of close-to-equilibrium solutions of nonlinear conservative oscillators with n-degrees of freedom (n >= 2) using semitrigonometric polynomials, given in closed form. A convergence theorem is proved. Moreover we present an iterative method which implements the proposed representation. Some significant examples are given. (c) 2006 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: On the representation of close-to-equilibrium solutions of n-dimensional conservative oscillators
